DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study test whether electronic pelvic floor questionnaire ( e-PAQ-PF ) increase discussion rate incontinence primary care setting .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Women 's Health Using Electronic Pelvic Floor Questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Woman Aged 40 old Scheduled well visit Women 's Health Internal Medicine West Clinic Unable speak English Unable fill questionnaire Excluded patient 's clinician prior recruitment
